## Biography
Ocean is a Junior at Northern Michigan University currently working toward a Bachelor’s in Biology with a concentration in Ecology. She is involved in the university’s Fisheries and Wildlife Association, and is particularly interested in conservation work as a career. Currently, Ocean is working on learning R, with hopes to begin learning GIS in the future to work on projects. In her personal time, she enjoys reading, drawing, and hiking.
